lead_paragraph: Congress expects to hold a hearing next month on thoroughbred racing, looking into horse safety and other issues after the death of Eight Belles. The Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection sent letters last week to several industry leaders, asking for their views on the sport.
